Desc.entry: Sheffield Health and Social Care, Community Learning Disability Team provides help and advice regarding the health needs of adolescents/adults with a learning disability aged 16 years and over, plus a range of assessments and therapies. The team consists of occupational therapists, communication therapists, physiotherapists, psychiatrists, psychologists, community nurses and social workers. Works with individuals and their carers and can be contacted direct for information and advice. Referral is acceptable from any source with the exception of a referral to psychiatry, which must be from a GP.
